comment._content: Champion billiards player Harry P. Cline of Pennsylvania: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C05E2D9103EE733A... See sports card here: www.vintagecardprices.com/card-profile/72025/Harry-Cline.htm Note that the playing table is a carom billiards table, with no pockets: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billiard_table#Carom_billiards_tables
